EnablingAuthority.XRefExternal: PUBLIC SERVICE REARRANGEMENT AND TRANSFER OF DUTIES ACT

Identification.LongTitle: Order Transferring to the Department of Communications the Control and Supervision of Certain Portions of the Public Service and to the Minister of Communications Certain Powers, Duties and Functions of the Secretary of State of Canada and of the Minister of Multiculturalism and Citizenship and Amalgamating and Combining the Departments of Communications and Multiculturalism and Citizenship under the Minister of Communications

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, is pleased hereby

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: pursuant to paragraph 2(a) of the Public Service Rearrangement and Transfer of Duties Act, to transfer

Provision.Label: (i)
Provision.Text: to the Department of Communications the control and supervision of

Provision.Label: (A)
Provision.Text: those portions of the Department of the Secretary of State referred to in clauses (a)(i)(A) to (C) of Order in Council P.C. 1993-1489 of June 25, 1993*, and

Footnote.Text: SI/93-143, 1993 Canada Gazette Part II, p. 3235

Provision.Label: (B)
Provision.Text: all portions of the Department of the Secretary of State, other than the portions referred to in paragraph (b) of Order in Council P.C. 1993-1901 of November 4, 1993**, and

Footnote.Text: SI/93-201, 1993 Canada Gazette Part II, p. 3996

Provision.Label: (A)
Provision.Text: all the powers, duties and functions of the Secretary of State of Canada under any Act of Parliament, other than the powers, duties and functions referred to in paragraph (a) of Order in Council P.C. 1993-1901 of November 4, 1993**, and

Provision.Label: (B)
Provision.Text: all the powers, duties and functions of the Minister of Multiculturalism and Citizenship under any Act of Parliament, other than the powers, duties and functions relating to citizenship transferred to the Secretary of State of Canada by subparagraph (a)(iv) of Order in Council P.C. 1993-1901 of November 4, 1993**; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: pursuant to paragraph 2(b) of that Act, to amalgamate and combine the Department of Communications and the Department of Multiculturalism and Citizenship under the Minister of Communications and under the Deputy Minister of Communications.
